title: Amravati Municipal Corporation Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for Data Analyst Posts
description: The Amravati Municipal Corporation has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Data Analyst Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, and M.E./M. Tech in Amravati Municipal Corporation Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection proc...
